subject: Documentary Films and Programs
Basketball (College)
Blacks
Television
lead_paragraph: Jalen Rose’s recent comment in an ESPN documentary that he considered black Duke players like Grant Hill to be Uncle Toms was insulting to everyone at the university, Coach Mike Krzyzewski said.
snippet: Jalen Rose’s recent comment in an ESPN documentary that he considered black Duke players like Grant Hill to be Uncle Toms was insulting to everyone at the university, Coach Mike Krzyzewski said.
